ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:40:48 [Issue ID 4000-335370] urn:comicvine:4000-335370 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 10:04:53. [Issue ID 943263]
ComicInfo.Summary:
At long last! The BEST-SELLING Marvel Zombies franchise returns!
A.R.M.O.R. is called upon to rescue a reality where the Nazis won WWII… with ZOMBIES!
Howard the Duck brings in Nazi-fighter extraordinaire DUM DUM DUGAN and a squadron of fighters known as Ducky’s Dozen!
ComicInfo.Title: Zombie Invaders!
